attributes.action: Protect the British Taxpayer from greedy and dishonourable politicians.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In these times when the British taxpayers are finding it difficult to make ends meet,it is not easy to believe that a room in your sisters home is a politicians main residence.Come on Mr Brown you might think we are all stupid but we are not.Make things a little bit more transparent and stop taking the Micky this is pure greed!

rejection.details: The matter to which you refer is currently being investigated by Parliament and it would be improper for the PM to intervene. Also, your petition does not describe exactly what you wish the PM or the Government to do.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
